channel.title: Crazy dreams..?
channel.description:
Well I never and I mean ever rember my dreams...I wake up and I think what did I dream about..and I new I had a dream.
But two dreams that are just weird..and crazy..
One I've had it 4times over and over I counted...I was on a building with my grandpa. Then a helicopter gets my grandpa and I mysteriously fall out of no where and then right when im about to hit the floor I wake up with my heart beating like crazy :|.
Another was just so random.. I was on this Like mountain and at like halfway walking it ended and you could see everything and it was all a desert. Then I just appeared in U.K. I know this because there was U.K. Airline ad's then I met a friend and we explored then I returned and woke up.. It was great though. Then for some reason I never have dreams on weekends :\. I also learned dreams are seconds before you wakeup and they feel so long :confused:. Some times short.
Post you're crazy/random/weird dreams. Have fun listening to other people's stories.

item.title: Crazy dreams..?
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“Bobby, post:10, topic:162352”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=220787.msg1915844#msg1915844 date=1196916835]

Thats not that weird. Everyone ( I assume) has weird dreams, but most forget theirs.
[/quote]Lol. Dude you want proper grammar here it is stop trying to act all smart.

I didn’t comment on your grammar nor was I trying to look smart. ( it just come naturally :P)[/quote]Ok then

Read full topic
